docs.lead_paragraph: Antibodies are nature's weapons for defending the body against invasion by foreign organisms. Sometimes, however, as in cases of organ transplants and allergies, these weapons can backfire and act against the body.

headline.main: ANTIBODY LINKED TO BABY ILLNESS; Scientist Says It May Cause Respiratory Disease

docs.abstract: G Stern Symposium on Perspectives in Virology, NYC
docs.snippet: Antibodies are nature's weapons for defending the body against invasion by foreign organisms. Sometimes, however, as in cases of organ transplants and allergies, these weapons can backfire and act against the body.

docs.lead_paragraph: " Since two-thirds of the infants who die in the neonatal period are born prematurely, the greatest challenge to obstetrics today is the p.revention of premature delivery."

headline.main: A Stiff Drink To Save Baby

docs.snippet: " Since two-thirds of the infants who die in the neonatal period are born prematurely, the greatest challenge to obstetrics today is the p.revention of premature delivery."
